post.content:

comment.author: Rob Garrett
comment.content: Let me know what the "surprise announcement" from MS is, I am dying to know ;)

comment.author: Chris Hynes
comment.content: The big news was Silverlight (http://silverlight.net/Default.aspx). Basically, a flash competitor, but with some pretty sweet windows media integration as well as (eventually) .NET integration. I'll probably write a followup article on this sometime in future...
